item.description:

item.title: The Mind and Its Brain
item.description:

Michael explains this relationship in terms of the brain depending upon & conforming to the intentions & passions of the mind -- that as energy, awareness is primary to the material brain.

This program addresses three beliefs held by early Christians that were proclaimed heretical by the Catholic Church of Rome as early as the 5th Century.

item.title: The Amazing Power of Hypnosis
item.description:
In this class, instructor Michael Benner explains hypnosis & meditation as two sides of the same coin -- meditation as a receptive state, hypnosis as more causative. Both promote an integration of the conscious & subconscious minds through relaxation, which reverses and neutralizes the fight-or-flight response, thus reducing brainwave frequencies to bring higher brain functions back into play, ie. creativity, conceptual understanding, memory, emotional sensitivity, healing & immune system.

Visit http:www.TheAgelessWisdom.com or call (818) 569-3017 for more information.

item.title: #10 Sleep and Dreams
item.description: Michael and Steve discuss the nature of sleep and the value of both daydreams and night dreams.
item.author: mb@theagelesswisdom.com (Michael Benner)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sleep and Dreams
item.itunes:summary: The dreams we have at night and occasionally remember upon awakening and deliberate focused daydreaming happen in the same levels of mind. Brian researchers call it the alpha & theta levels. In this podcast, Michael and Steve discuss the practical value of both experiences, plus how to incubate dreams to provide enhanced intuition, how to psych-up for the next day, and wake up naturally without an alarm clock at the precise time you wish to awaken.Visit www.TheAgelessWisdom.com or call 818/569-3017 for more information. item.title: The First Focused Passion Podcast
item.description: Michael and Steve explore ways to realize your Higher Self. In this introductory Podcast.
item.author: mb@theagelesswisdom.com (Michael Benner)
item.itunes:subtitle: The First Focused Passion Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
Michael and Steve explore ways to realize your Higher Self. In this introductory Podcast.
To varying degrees, most people are in touch with their longing to be better -- an aspect of conscience that compels learning, healing, and growth. In this program, Steve and Michael explore ways to realize your Higher Self ... an essential Self that experiences Harmony and Love in All Things. Questions of self-esteem beg the question, which self -- the frightened, separative self or the Higher Self of Wisdom, Love and Truth? In a more practical sense, the self that is the problem, or the self that knows the solution?
